item.description:
Free Introductory Talk

Come join us for a FREE Intro to Wicca discussion group on Thursday September 4th
from 7:00- 9:00 pm to find out what Wicca really is, and what it is NOT.

Learn about the Wiccan beliefs and misconceptions, and some interesting tidbits that most people don't know!

This discussion group is for beginners who want to learn about
what Wicca is truly about, and also for those more advanced in the craft who would like to join the discussion and learn more about the class content of my upcoming Witchcraft Training series that begins September 11th will also be reviewed.

Each course builds upon another, and upon completion the student will obtain the knowledge to the Level of the First Degree.

Look forward to a night of questions and discussions!

Complementary Appetizers

Come join us! :)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the room directly in line with the door!
item.name: The Truth About Wicca : Free Discussion
